alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 10 at 7:51PM CDT until October 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Expected Tuesday; Wind Shift During Afternoon/Evening... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 8 PM MDT TUESDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 013, 079, 080, 081, 252, AND 253... * Affected Area...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma and Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson. In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne, Fire Weather Zone 002 Rawlins, Fire Weather Zone 003 Decatur, Fire Weather Zone 004 Norton, Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman, Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas, Fire Weather Zone 015 Sheridan and Fire Weather Zone 016 Graham. In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 079 Dundy, Fire Weather Zone 080 Hitchcock and Fire Weather Zone 081 Red Willow. * Winds...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...Around 10 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Expect a rapid change in character and direction of any fires Tuesday afternoon/evening in response to the passage of a cold front. Outdoor burning is not advised. * Additional Details... A cold front is expected to move through during the late afternoon/early evening. Winds will suddenly increase and shift to out of the north as the front passes.
info.instruction: Avoid burning or creating sparks. If a fire starts, putting it out will be more difficult due to strong wind speeds and changing directions.
